Package civitas.celestis.math.quaternion

Class Quaternion

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.vector.Vector4
civitas.celestis.math.quaternion.Quaternion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Number, Vector
public class Quaternion extends Vector4
Represents a quaternion with w, x, y, and z components. This class provides methods for quaternion arithmetic, magnitude calculations, conversions, and other operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Quaternion
    IDENTITY
    The identity quaternion, representing no rotation.

      y - The y-component of the quaternion.
      z - The z-component of the quaternion.

    • builder

      Creates a new instance of QuaternionBuilder to start building a quaternion.
      Returns:
      A new QuaternionBuilder instance for constructing quaternions.

    • apply

      @Nonnull public Quaternion apply(@Nonnull UnaryOperator<Double> operator)
      Description copied from interface: Vector
      Applies the given unary operator to each component of the vector and returns a new vector with the resulting values.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Vector
      Overrides:
      apply in class Vector4
      Parameters:
      operator - The unary operator to apply to each component.
      Returns:
      A new vector with the components transformed by the given operator.

    • multiply

      @Nonnull public Quaternion multiply(@Nonnull Quaternion q)
      Performs left-multiplication of quaternions, with this being the left and q being the right.
      Parameters:
      q - The right-hand quaternion for the multiplication.
      Returns:
      The left-product of the two quaternions.

    • scale

      @Nonnull public Quaternion scale(double s)
      Scales the quaternion by a rotation factor and returns a new rotated quaternion.
      Parameters:
      s - The scaling factor representing the rotation.
      Returns:
      A new quaternion resulting from scaling by the rotation factor.

    • axis

      @Nonnull public Vector3 axis()
      Calculates the axis of rotation represented by this quaternion.
      Returns:
      The axis of rotation represented by this quaternion.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the quaternion represents no rotation (identity quaternion).

      IllegalStateException - If the quaternion represents no rotation (identity quaternion).

    • isIdentity

      public boolean isIdentity()
      Checks if this quaternion is equal to the identity quaternion within a certain margin of significance.
      Returns:
      true if this quaternion is approximately equal to the identity quaternion, false otherwise.

    • equals

    • toBuilder

      @Nonnull public QuaternionBuilder toBuilder()
      Returns a new instance of QuaternionBuilder initialized with the current state of this QuaternionBuilder. This allows creating a new QuaternionBuilder that starts from the same quaternion state as the current builder.
      Returns:
      A new QuaternionBuilder initialized with the current state of this builder.

    • toString

      @Nonnull public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the quaternion in the format: Quaternion{w=value, x=value, y=value, z=value}.

      Returns:
      A string representation of the quaternion.

    • parseQuaternion

      @Nonnull public static Quaternion parseQuaternion(@Nonnull String input)
      Parses a string representation of a quaternion and returns a new Quaternion instance.
      Parameters:
      input - The string representation of the quaternion in the format: "w=value, x=value, y=value, z=value".
      Returns:
      A new Quaternion instance with the parsed values.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - If the input string is not formatted correctly.
